content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetZoneRecords path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/dns/v1/stacks/{stack_id}/zones/{zone_id}/records content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name zoneid
desc a dns zone id
in path
required true
schema
type str
name pagerequestfirst
desc the number of items desired
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestafter
desc the cursor value after which data will be returned
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestfilter
desc sqlstyle constraint filters
in query
required false
schema
type str
name pagerequestsortby
desc sort the response by the given field
in query
required false
schema
type str
sum get all records
responses
200
zonegetzonerecordsresponse
type obj
props
paginationpageinfo
type obj
props
totalcount
type str
desc the total number of items in the dataset
haspreviouspage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not a previous page of data exists
hasnextpage
type bool
format bool
desc whether or not another page of data is available
startcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the first item in the set of data returned
endcursor
type str
desc the cursor for the last item in the set of data returned
desc information about a paginated response

this is modeled after the graphql relay spec to support both cursor based pagination and traditional offset based pagination
records
type arr
zonezonerecord
type obj
props
id
type str
desc a zone records unique id
zoneid
type str
desc the id of the zone that a zone record belongs to
name
type str
desc a zone records name

use the value  to denote current root domain name
type
type str
desc a zone records type

zone record types describe the zone records behavior for instance a zone records type can say that the record is a name to ip address value a name alias or which mail exchanger is responsible for the domain see https//supportstackpathcom/hc/enus/articles/360001085563whatdnsrecordtypesdoesstackpathsupport for more information
class
type str
desc a zone records class code

this is typically in for internet related resource records
ttl
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records time to live

a records ttl is the number of seconds that the record should be cached by dns resolvers use lower ttl values if you expect zone records to change often use higher ttl values for records that wont change to prevent extra dns lookups by clients
data
type str
desc a zone records value

mx record data follows the format   without s
weight
type integer
format int32
desc a zone records priority

a resource record is replicated in stackpaths dns infrastructure the number of times of the records weight giving it a more likely response to queries if a zone has records with the same name and type
labels
type str
desc a key/value pair of userdefined labels for a zone record

zone record labels are not processed by stackpath and are solely used for users to organize their dns zones
created
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone record was created
updated
type str
format datetime
desc the date a zone record was last updated
desc a dns zones resource record

a zone record describes an individual piece of dns functionality in a dns zone
desc the requested resource records
desc a response from a request to retrieve a dns zones resource records
title: 21_Resource Records_GetZoneRecords_116.json
